properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova naina nenu marpuleni vadanu gana Yakobu santhathivaragu meeru layamu kaledu (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudehova manushyudu kadu mata meerani vadu Paschattapa padade mathram abaddamada neradu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Na dasudaina daveedu nimittamu nadhu nimittamunu Ee pattanamunu kapadi rakshinthu veruthanni vareduguduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yakobu devuni naamamu ninnu uddarinchunu gaka Aapathkalamanduna neeku uttaramu nichunu gaka{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sainyamu ladhipathi pratyakshamai thana prajalanu rakshimpa Kireetamandali ratnamulavale surakshithamuga nundedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Galivanaku aasrayamai pagati yendaku needai Parnasala nokati undaga surakshithamuga nundedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mahima yanthati paina thanadu vithana meghamu nilachu Seeyonu nandali prathi sthalamandu prabhava mahima prajwalinchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lemmu neevu O siyonu dhariyinchu needu balamunu Loniki radu anyudevadunu hrudaya sunnathi lenivadu{/lang-eng}
